title: So much to give: a report from Anne Deveson
creator_credit: Pilgrim Films, Warwick Olson and Betti Wood
brief_description: Seeks to develop community awareness of the needs of mentally handicapped children. Shows interviews with parents, teachers, doctors and social workers involved with these children. Script and voice - Anne Deveson.
